00063 class HandlerBase {
00064   public:
00068     HandlerBase();
00069 
00073     virtual ~HandlerBase();
00074 
00078     template <class WidgetType>
00079     WidgetType *findWidget(int32_t widgetId) {
00080         if (mpRootWidget) {
00081              gaia::core::Widget *pWidget =
00082                  mpRootWidget->findWidgetById(widgetId);
00083             return dynamic_cast<WidgetType *>(pWidget);
00084         } else {
00085             return NULL;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00092     gaia::core::Widget *getRootWidget();
00093 
00097     void setControllerParams(int32_t widgetId,
00098             gaia::ui::ControllerParams *params);
00099 
00103     void setPadding(int32_t widgetId, int32_t left, int32_t top,
00104             int32_t right, int32_t bottom);
00105 
00109     void setRootMarginLeft(int32_t margin);
00110 
00114     void setRootMarginRight(int32_t margin);
00115 
00120     void setPanelWidth(int32_t width);
00121 
00125     gaia::ui::ControllerParams *getControllerParams(int32_t widgetId);
00126 
00130     static const int32_t EXTENSION = -3;
00131 
00133   protected:
00134     static const int32_t ST_CONTAINER_ID = 1;
00135     gaia::core::Widget *mpRootWidget;
00137     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(HandlerBase);
00138 };
